Glow potion

The glow potion is generally the first potion an individual will learn to make when studying potion making. It is seen as the most straightforward potion since it only has a few ingredients. It is also recommended as a beginners potion as making it incorrectly will only lead to other harmless potions such as the grey puddle potion and the whistling potion. (Making some potions incorrectly can lead to potentially dangerous side-effects)
